hypothesis_content.title: Post-Stress Altcoin Correlation Re-Engagement
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a 'STRESS' regime (VIX > 35 or BTC 10-day drawdown > 25%), the first day that BTC rallies >5% on above-average volume will trigger a disproportionately larger rally in high-beta altcoins (SOL, AVAX, etc.) over the next 48 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In stress periods, altcoins decouple and underperform due to de-risking. The first strong BTC relief rally signals risk-on resumption, causing a violent re-correlation and short squeeze in oversold alts.
entry_conditions: Market regime transitions FROM 'STRESS' to 'NEUTRAL' or 'BULL'
BTC rallies >5% on a daily close with volume > 20-day avg volume
Aggregate altcoin perpetual funding rates are still negative or neutral

exit_conditions.take_profit: Target altcoin (e.g., SOL) gains 1.8x the BTC rally percentage over 48h
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC fails to hold >50% of its rally gain by the next daily close

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC rally >5% fails to produce any altcoin outperformance (beta <1) in the subsequent 48h on two separate stress-exit occasions.
